entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 8:41 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening and after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 before morning. Temperature steady near 9. Forecast issued 8:41 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 40%
